original_solution_mapping.L1: He needs to get an oil change every 3000/1000 = <<3000/1000=3>>3 months
original_solution_mapping.L2: So he gets 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 oil changes a year
original_solution_mapping.L3: That means he pays for 4-1 = <<4-1=3>>3 oil changes a year

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6451.
    Returns: the total annual cost of oil changes.
    """
    # L1
    oil_change_interval_miles = 3000 # every 3000 miles
    miles_per_month = 1000 # drives 1000 miles a month
    oil_change_interval_months = oil_change_interval_miles / miles_per_month

    # L2
    months_per_year = 12 # WK
    total_oil_changes_per_year = months_per_year / oil_change_interval_months

    # L3
    free_oil_changes_per_year = 1 # 1 free oil change a year
    paid_oil_changes_per_year = total_oil_changes_per_year - free_oil_changes_per_year

    # L4
    cost_per_oil_change = 50 # an oil change costs $50
    total_annual_cost = paid_oil_changes_per_year * cost_per_oil_change

    # FA
    answer = total_annual_cost
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He needs to get an oil change every {oil_change_interval_miles}/{miles_per_month} = <<{oil_change_interval_miles}/{miles_per_month}={oil_change_interval_months}>>{oil_change_interval_months} months
So he gets {months_per_year}/{oil_change_interval_months} = <<{months_per_year}/{oil_change_interval_months}={total_oil_changes_per_year}>>{total_oil_changes_per_year} oil changes a year

That means he pays for {total_oil_changes_per_year}-{free_oil_changes_per_year} = <<{total_oil_changes_per_year}-{free_oil_changes_per_year}={paid_oil_changes_per_year}>>{paid_oil_changes_per_year} oil changes a year

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He needs to get an oil change every 3000/1000 = <<3000/1000=3>>3 months
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So he gets 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 oil changes a year
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: That means he pays for 4-1 = <<4-1=5>>5 oil changes a year

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
